attributes.action:
Alan Shearer for England Manager!

Get the passion back into England
attributes.background: Shearer is an England Legend, he is an England fan, he also believes Jack Whilshire & Raheem Stirling should not have been taken on the back of poor performances at club level, and also wonders Why Harry Kane is taking set pieces, also place the right coaching staff under Shearer England will go far

rejection.details: The appointment of the England manager is a matter for the FA.
